Title: Mouse Gesture Library
Description: Mouse Gesture Library makes it easier for .net Framework users to build WPF Applications

Project Description
This project aims at building a mouse gesture library using Microsoft .NET Framework WPF Graphics Component.
该项目旨在使用微软.NET Framework WPF图形组件创建鼠标手势响应的函数库。
包含以下手势识别
The following gestures are supported:

按住
Hold
摇晃
Shake
滑翔
Glide
More gestures pending
更多的手势将会被识别
